mapper.select: select p.*, u.nickname designerName, u.mobile designerMobile, u.avatar designerAvatar, u.special designerSpecial from t_project p inner join t_user u on u.id=p.userId where p.taskId=#{taskId} order by selected desc, id desc

SELECT COUNT(id) AS totalCount, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN selected = 1 AND state=1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS selectedCount, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN state = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS submittedCount, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN state = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS waitingCount FROM t_project where taskId=#{taskId}
select * from t_project where userId=#{userId} order by id desc
mapper.insert: insert into t_project (userId, taskId, acceptTime, state, readed, selected) values (#{userId}, #{taskId}, #{acceptTime}, #{state}, #{readed}, #{selected})
mapper.update: update t_project set state=#{state}, submitTime=#{submitTime}, proposalDescribe=#{proposalDescribe}, proposalHidden=#{proposalHidden}, readed=#{readed}, selected=#{selected} where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into t_projectfile (projectId, url, description) values (#{projectId}, #{url}, #{description})
mapper.select: select userId from t_project where taskId=#{taskId} and selected=1 and state=1
